name: Killer Gold
description:
Description

A simple, wave-based shooter about a piece of gold, upset with some silver. This project was made in 3 days, using Unity, for the 85th Mini Jam game jam.

Gameplay

The goal of this game is to exact your revenge upon those dirty pieces of silver before your time runs out. You initially have 60 seconds, after beginning this time will slowly expire. However, by shooting silver, you gain time. Just be sure not to get too close! Otherwise, you will have to start over. (I was so sleepy while typing this;-;)

Controls

WASD - Movement (m o v e)

Left Mouse Button - Shoot (Has no inhibitors)

R - Reload (Takes some time)

Shift - Sprint (Drains time rapidly)
